title: Shen AD possibilty please
body: Shen q and E should deal physical damage while w and ult should scale off AP no? i mean hes throwing a ninja dagger at them with q and his taunt is hitting them physically its not like its a energy blast or anything.

replies.body:
Real Life Logic =/= Gameplay Logic

Deal with it.
Id rather have {{champion:85}} have an ad scaling on his q
Ninja Dagger? He's throwing a god damn Katana at their face. lol.
